wordGroup: consecutive days 连续营业日；连续作业日

sentences.en: The Cup was won for the third consecutive year by the Toronto Maple Leafs.
sentences.cn: 这个奖杯连续第三年由多伦多枫叶队赢去了。

sentences.en: Its Campaign to Protect Rural England struck terror into many local Consecutive parties.
sentences.cn: 它保护英格兰农村的运动使许多地方连续政党感到恐惧。

sentences.en: You know that studying six consecutive hours is not equivalent to studying one hour a day for six days.
sentences.cn: 你知道连续学习6个小时并不等于连续6天每天学习1个小时。
